DOC.brief_summary: To assess efficacy safety Zonisamide Topiramate Initial Monotherapy Untreated Epilepsies
DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter Comparative Trial Zonisamide Topiramate Initial Monotherapy Untreated Epilepsies
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Patients 13 year old ( complete elementary school course ) . 2 . Patients least two seizure past least one seizure last 3 month screen . 3 . Patients antiepileptic drug last 4 month . 4 . Women childbearing age agree contraception participate clinical trial . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Pregnancy 2 . Patients progressive neurologic disease 3 . Allergy sulfonamides 4 . Use acetazolamide within year 5 . Hemolytic anemia 6 . Patients abnormal liver function ( GOT GPT ) value twice normal value . 7 . Patients abnormal renal function ( BUN Creatinine ) value three time normal value . 8 . Patients history drug alcohol abuse . 9 . Glucose6phosphate dehydrogenase deficiency . 10 . Patients detect renal stone KUB ( KidneyUreterBladder ) test . 11 . Patients progressive internal surgical disease . 12 . Patients progressive psychiatric disease . 13 . Patients mental retardation ( IQ 70 less ) . 14 . Patients take Vit C .
